title: Banamex Aims to Expand Corporate Banking, Seek Brokerage License
description: Citigroup Inc.’s Mexican retail banking unit aims to keep up aggressive growth in consumer credit and will seek to re-enter the corporate banking sector, as it operates more independently from its longtime parent, according to its leader.
content: Citigroup Inc.’s Mexican retail banking unit aims to keep up aggressive growth in consumer credit and will seek to re-enter the corporate banking sector, as it operates more independently from its longtime parent, according to its leader.
